summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Roanoke Street, from Federal Avenue North to 11th Avenue North; 11th Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to East Blaine Street; East Blaine Street, from 10th Avenue North to 11th Avenue North; East Howe Street from 10th Avenue North to 11th Avenue North; East Newton Street, from Federal Avenue North to 11th Avenue North; East Boston Street from Federal Avenue North to 13th Avenue North; East Lynn Street, from Federal Avenue North to 11th Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 834 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
